data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=TmrihHGIDlsQ7kNvgHUsKS3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCk4HrTvVHl0g2D0fsjU-fNnn7AOvRidDkL0RpfQq9wcA&oe=66A3644C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wSenZqWk6VwQ7kNvgE27D5F&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCUeQ8xxoQb8fbsCDWdK3Dce-vRDljtuFHeybgmtUItuA&oe=66A39A9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QL3PIjw9O6MQ7kNvgEMapLW&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAQeum1D3uo0DYaw7PyhcT5Z0Z3LD1zA-aIyW6hotwTDQ&oe=66A37FF1)
